actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that certain criminal penalties imposed as a result of the failure of an individual to answer to questions submitted in connection with a census or survey conducted under title 13, United States Code, shall not be applicable to any census taken under section 142 of such title.

summary.text: Removes the criminal penalties for refusing or neglecting to answer certain agricultural, irrigation, or drainage census or survey questions.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain criminal penalties imposed as a result of the failure of an individual to answer to questions submitted in connection with a census or survey conducted under title 13, United States Code, shall not be applicable to any census taken under section 142 of such title.
